results.title: Don't tell me I can't
results.creator_credit: Krystyna Popczyk and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: This is a daughter’s dedication to her mother. Krystina’s mother managed a vision and hearing impairment with great courage and a ‘don’t tell me I can’t’ attitude.
results.description: This is a daughter’s dedication to her mother. Krystina’s mother managed a vision and hearing impairment with great courage and a ‘don’t tell me I can’t’ attitude.
description_for_label: This is a daughter’s dedication to her mother. Krystina’s mother managed a vision and hearing impairment with great courage and a ‘don’t tell me I can’t’ attitude.

results.title: A Global family
results.brief_description: Suzanne reflects on the impacts of her HIV diagnosis and in particular coming to terms with the fact that her dream to have children would not be realised in the way that she first imagined.
results.description: Suzanne reflects on the impacts of her HIV diagnosis and in particular coming to terms with the fact that her dream to have children would not be realised in the way that she first imagined.

results.title: No more funerals
results.creator_credit: Michelle W and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Michelle is diagnosed with HIV in the early 80’s. She reflects on how treatments have improved over the years and celebrates the fact that she no longer attends as many funerals.
results.description: Michelle is diagnosed with HIV in the early 80’s. She reflects on how treatments have improved over the years and celebrates the fact that she no longer attends as many funerals.

results.title: Healing
results.creator_credit: Judith Odgers and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Judith is teaching in Thailand as a young teacher. It is an extraordinary cultural experience and also life changing as Judith is diagnosed with HIV. This story delves into the psyche of a young woman coming to terms with the taboos and limitations of the virus she has contracted.

results.title: Ecology and dreams
results.creator_credit: Roberto Salvatore and ACMI Content Development
results.brief_description: A dream for Lizzie and Shayne to make a difference in our world has become a reality in their little part of it. Together they have established the award-winning Cape Otway Centre for Conservation Ecology.
results.description: A dream for Lizzie and Shayne to make a difference in our world has become a reality in their little part of it. Together they have established the award-winning Cape Otway Centre for Conservation Ecology.

results.title: The Goddess and the poet
results.creator_credit: David Meagher, Roberto Salvatore and ACMI
results.brief_description: Meet Christos Raskatos, old fashioned romantic. Meet him as a poet who has a love affair with words, as a local in love with Lorne and as a guy who catches a crayfish now and then in paradise. Interview taken at Lorne Fisheries, Lorne Pier.
results.description: Meet Christos Raskatos, old fashioned romantic. Meet him as a poet who has a love affair with words, as a local in love with Lorne and as a guy who catches a crayfish now and then in paradise. Interview taken at Lorne Fisheries, Lorne Pier.
